description:
Yakumo befriends a foreigner - in between her clairvoyant activities and frequent cat naps. The Class 2-C seating arrangements put Tenma in a tizzy over sitting next to her heart throb, but a certain bad boy is stressing over sitting next to her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mata Shingakki de Dokidoki! / Soba ni Itakute Jitabata! / Hadaka no Kimi ni Dokyuun!
New-Term Excitement! / To Be Near You Scramble! / The Naked Truth!
また新学期でドキドキ! / そばにいたくてジタバタ! / ハダカの君にドキューン!
